qas.question: In which year was the study published that found biodiversity and genetic diversity are codependent?
What can cause a break down of a biodiversity system?

answers.text: If any one type is removed from the system

qas.question: Where are the most threatened ecosystems found?
In which year was the study published that found biodiversity and community diversity are codependent?

plausible_answers.text: If any one type is removed from the system

qas.question: What can cause a break down of a water system?
Where are the most threatened species found?
What said that the most threatened ecosystems are found in France?

context: A <a0_0><b4_0>2007<b4_0/><a0_0/> study conducted by the <a1_0><b5_0>National Science Foundation<b5_0/><a1_0/> found that biodiversity and genetic diversity are codependent—that diversity among species requires diversity within a species, and vice versa. "<a2_0><b6_0>If any one type is removed from the system<b6_0/><a2_0/>, the cycle can break down, and the community becomes dominated by a single species." At present, the most threatened ecosystems are found <a3_0><b7_0>in fresh water<b7_0/><a3_0/>, according to the <b8_0>Millennium Ecosystem Assessment 2005<b8_0/>, which was confirmed by the "Freshwater Animal Diversity Assessment", organised by the biodiversity platform, and the French Institut de recherche pour le développement (MNHNP).
